channel.title: Latest News on
channel.description: Recent content in Latest News on

item.title: Why restaurants are leaving third-party aggregators
item.description: Introducing delivery and collection options through digital ordering services clearly represents a major opportunity for hospitality businesses of all sizes. This has of course taken on heightened significance during the past year, with coronavirus changing society so drastically and forcing dine-in facilities to close for long periods. Struggling to survive in the circumstances, pivoting to takeaway through online ordering has been a real lifeline for many businesses. In many cases, online ordering gives restaurants and takeaways a whole new stream of income and a great chance to increase their sales.

item.title: How to improve the Table Ordering experience for your customers
item.description: Here are five simple steps to provide an even better experience for your customers when introducing Table Ordering through QR codes in your restaurant. Ensure that you have a QR code specific to Table Ordering QiosQi data shows that your customers will order more, and more often, when you make it easy for them to find what they need from your Table Ordering menu. We provide our partners with the option of having a customised menu for their customers who are using Table Ordering.
